event-block:
Experience the opening of the famous vin jaune or ‘yellow wine’ of the Jura region!
The opening of the vin jaune or yellow wine, in the Jura region, is a special experience, just like the wine it is celebrating. This wine festival, on the first weekend in February, attracts 40,000 visitors, with 70 winemakers offering wine tastings of their own produce in a festive atmosphere.
summary: The opening of the vin jaune or yellow wine, in the Jura region, is a special experience, just like the wine it is celebrating. This wine festival, on the first weekend in February, attracts 40,000 visitors, with 70 winemakers offering wine tastings of their own produce in a festive atmosphere.
title: Experience the opening of the famous vin jaune or ‘yellow wine’ of the Jura region!
